org.bytedeco.depthai

Class ImageManipConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.depthai.ADatatype
        • org.bytedeco.depthai.Buffer
          • org.bytedeco.depthai.ImageManipConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Namespace(value="dai")
 @NoOffset
 @Properties(inherit=depthai.class)
public class ImageManipConfig
extends Buffer
    ImageManipConfig message. Specifies image manipulation options like: - Crop - Resize - Warp - ...

      • setCenterCrop

        @ByRef
public ImageManipConfig setCenterCrop(float ratio,
                                             float whRatio)
        Specifies a centered crop.
        Parameters:
        ratio - Ratio between input image and crop region (0..1)
        whRatio - Crop region aspect ratio - 1 equals to square, 1.7 equals to 16:9, ...
